channel.title: [718] LonelySouls || Customs || New Content || Highscores || Check it out!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/Y122CSY.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/CFeDTtG.png[/img]
[b]Patch Notes/Recent Updates[/b] : [url=http://lonelysouls718.com/showthread.php?tid=9&pid=327]Here[/url]
[b]Forum[/b] : [url=http://lonelysouls718.com]Here[/url] [b]Downloadable client [/b] : [url=https://mega.co.nz/#!KRQiCbLY!dXl6r2wZ8NQ5DBgMp8C4E4R6lirrXOvyAJxqZ7YbYJQ]Here[/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/DcWt1ag.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/7GxMA2Y.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/nEitzzn.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/coKTuw5.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/f2Nlwiq.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/hAoCiEU.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1BYX6ZP.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/MtYbG2k.png[/img]
[SPOILER=Media || Images] [B][COLOR=orange]~ Home ~[/COLOR][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/p86QHvo.jpg[/img] [B][COLOR=orange]~ Home ~[/COLOR][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/q0i6INu.jpg[/img] [B][COLOR=orange]~ Nomad's Requiem ~[/COLOR][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/li4Y3kG.png[/img] [B][COLOR=orange]~ Thunderous (Donor's Only) ~[/COLOR][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/uCKzEyf.png[/img] [B][COLOR=orange]~ Glacors ~[/COLOR][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/BuYgt45.png[/img] [B][COLOR=orange]~ Lucien ~[/COLOR][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/fW74SXv.png[/img] [B][COLOR=orange]~ Wildy Wyrms~[/COLOR][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/OPOUAcG.png[/img] [B][COLOR=orange]~ Mercenary Mage (Multi or Solo) ~[/COLOR][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/w8KJyRC.png[/img] [B][COLOR=orange]~ Updated Donator Zone ~[/COLOR][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/X7cEx8E.gif[/img] [B][COLOR=orange]~ Sunfreet (Donor's Only) ~[/COLOR][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/tSjExHz.png[/img] [B][color=orange]~ Realistic Farming ~[/COLOR][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/vzYb9jF.gif[/img][/center]
[Spoiler=Patch Notes and Recent Updates] [Spoiler=Updates of 2014] http://lonelysouls718.com/showthread.php?tid=9&pid=12#pid12 [/Spoiler] [i]1/8[/i]
TO BE RELEASED:
+ Christmas event has been getting moved over to LIVE launch date is hopefully next week! + Been working more on Slayer related topics. -- Ability to get assigned Boss Tasks from a different NPC and still count for slayer XP. -- Tasks will be given a second look at for players who keep getting assigned tasks they cannot do. + Effigies are being looked at for soon being drops for NPC in which players would normally kill (Example: Man(level2) = no Effigy. [i]1/13[/i] + Christmas has been officially launched! + New difficulty has been being worked on for the players who wish to have a more challenging experience [i]1/18[/i] + Fixed some dialogue errors with the White Wolf Mountain Snow Imp + Fixed the bug with the Imp in Falador in which players could obtain more than 1 of each kind of bead. [i]1/24[/i] + Dupe glitch involving the bank tabs has been patched. + Highlander clothing from Livid Farm is now wearable by Male characters. [i]1/25[/i] + Highlander now displays the correct model image for Male characters. [i]1/26[/i] + PvP has launched out in Beta due to the high amount of players wanting it. + Since PvP is in beta, reporting any bugs or issues is a must if you want to improve the experience. + Grave Stones has been added. + Pastor at home can now set up your Grave Stone settings. + Sunfreet's 'unblockable' move has now changed from a solid '650', to a range of '200-600'. [i]1/27[/i] + The bug where players would be able to see another player's items if they died in a non-dangerous area, has now been patched. + Players can now bless or repair Grave Stones. + Players can now demolish their current Grave Stone if they wish. [i]1/31[/i] + Trivia Bot has been updated with all new Trivia! + The title "Onee-Chan" has been properly spaced between itself and the Player's name. + Players can no longer bypass the 200m requirement to wear a 200m XP Cape by going through the bank's equipment interface. [i]2/1[/i] + Annihilation now has the proper Attack and Strength Requirement. (90) + Decimation now has the proper Ranged Requirement. (90) + Obliteration now has the proper Magic Requirement. (90) + Abyssal Vine Whip now has the proper Attack and Slayer Requirement. (85/80) + Christmas has now been removed from the game. + Christmas Pudding Amulet no longer gives bonus xp but can still be used as a good fashion statement!
[i]2/2[/i] + Saradomin Godsword now has it's correct Animation and GFX effects.
[i]2/4[/i] + Fixed Prices on Onyx's + Player Owned Shops are now complete and released. [i]2/5[/i] + Players can now sell back to shops which are permitted for it. + Players can now put separate group sets of items in their Shop + Controlled timer inbetween Dice Rolls + Rolls now broadcast to players [i]2/8[/i] + Duel Arena is now available for players. [i]2/9[/i] + Fixed the effect of forfeiting when in the Duel Arena + Players can now eat when fighting + Donator's can no longer Bank while inside the Duel Arena + Players must be inside the Duel Arena building in order to Challenge each other. [i]2/17[/i] + Royal Crossbow's can now be forged successfully. + Royal Crossbow requires level 70 Smithing to forge. + When forging a Royal Crossbow, you will receive a heafy amount of knowledge gained to your Smithing Skill. + Players will now receive a Global Message when someone obtains 200 Million experience in any skill. [i]2/23[/i] + Nex Spawning glitch has been fixed. + "Stake X" now successfully works. + Players will now see in Global Chat if someone wins a rare item while staking. + No Movement has been successfully fixed. Players will no longer spawn in separate locations with this rule enabled. + Players can no longer bank in duel arena. + Players can no longer bank while in the Fight Caves + Players can no longer bank while in the Fight Kiln + Spirit Shields now have the correct Smithing level requirement programmed (75). [i]3/18[/i] Been a long time I know, life before all. Glad to be back to push out some updates! + Max/Completionist Cape stand at home has been completely remake to make recovering lost capes an easy process. + Bonecrusher has been added to the Dungeoneering store. + Bonecrusher gives the ability to automatically bury bones and apply exp to the Prayer Skill. + Bonecrusher gives players 40% less xp than burying the bone on your own. + Donators can no longer use the ::bank command in the Death Realm. [i]3/23[/i] + Trivia has been updated and refreshed. + Bonecrusher now works with Dagganoth Bones. + Bonecrusher now works with Big Bones. + Dwarf Multi-Cannon's combat has been adjusted accordingly. + After hours, weeks, and months of working on this one issue. ---Players can now remove items they are wearing from the Equipment Bonus Interface. [i]3/24[/i] + Improved bot control while Thieving. [i]3/26[/i] + Fixed the glitch with Gravestones where players would lose items if they dc'd before looting their items. + Banana Thieving table now gives Bananas. + General Thieving table now gives randomized general items. + Magic Runes Thieving table now gives random runes. + Scimitar Thieving table now gives Steel Scimitars. [i]3/31[/i] + Updated the Donation Shop + The familar Pack Yak's special ability "Winter Storage" now successfully works. [i]4/3[/i] + Anti-fires now coincide perfectly with the use of DFS or Protect from Magic. + Super Anti-fires now work perfectly, even if the player is using DFS or Protect from Magic. + Frost Dragon's dragon fire attack has been tweeked to calculate how much damage should be given, depending on the combination of dragon fire protection, the player is using. + Metal Dragon's (Iron, Steel, Mithril) has also had their dragon fire attack tweeked to the same above. With the exception that their dragon fire breath will do more damage. + King Black Dragon has this done as well, except his dragon fire breath is more stronger, if the user is not fully protected. + Queen Black Dragon has not had this update effect her combat. + Glacors has been properly coded (hopefully I got everything) which will include the: -- Ice Spike Attack -- 3 Minions who appear at 40% hp -- Each minion has their own unique identity to the Glacor. + Cape stand has been fixed for players who has Max Cape, and has not yet obtained the Completionist Cape. Players will now get a menu in which they can reclaim their Max Cape if they lose it. [i]4/5[/i] + Red and Grey Chinchompas are now available as a ranged weapon 90% Complete. [i]4/8[/i] + Trivia has been reduced to 1 winner + Fixed a problem with staking in the Duel Arena [i]4/9[/i] + Wolf Bones are now able to be buried. + Wolf Bones can now be used on a Gilded Altar. + Wolf Bones will automatically be buried if player has a Bonecrusher in their inventory. [i]4/11[/i] + When making Extreme Ranging Potions, you will now make a full inventory instead of 1 at a time. + Advanced Gnome Agility has been added. [/spoiler]

item.title: [718] LonelySouls || Customs || New Content || Highscores || Check it out!
item.dc:creator: @_JESUS2 LonelySouls
item.description:
@_JESUS2 wrote:

Gladiator22:

Awesome server, constant updates and awesome polished content. The community is great and very helpful! Definitely a huge amount of content and enjoyment on this server!

Thanks! I’m glad you’re enjoying yourself mate!

Here is a Recent Patch Note Update List:

4/5

  • Red and Grey Chinchompas are now available as a ranged weapon 90% Complete.
    4/8
  • Trivia has been reduced to 1 winner
  • Fixed a problem with staking in the Duel Arena
    4/9
  • Wolf Bones are now able to be buried.
  • Wolf Bones can now be used on a Gilded Altar.
  • Wolf Bones will automatically be buried if player has a Bonecrusher in their inventory.
    4/11
  • When making Extreme Ranging Potions, you will now make a full inventory instead of 1 at a time.
  • Advanced Gnome Agility has been added.

Read full topic

item.title: [718] LonelySouls || Customs || New Content || Highscores || Check it out!
item.dc:creator: @_JESUS2 LonelySouls
item.description:
@_JESUS2 wrote:

Been real busy irl for awhile guys but I’m back.

Recent Updates 3/31

More updates are still in launch, hope everyone is having fun or will be enjoying themselves.

Here are a few updates from my patch notes.

[COLOR=orange]4/3[/COLOR]

  • Anti-fires now coincide perfectly with the use of DFS or Protect from Magic.
  • Super Anti-fires now work perfectly, even if the player is using DFS or Protect from Magic.
  • Frost Dragon’s dragon fire attack has been tweeked to calculate how much damage should be given, depending on the combination of dragon fire protection, the player is using.
  • Metal Dragon’s (Iron, Steel, Mithril) has also had their dragon fire attack tweeked to the same above. With the exception that their dragon fire breath will do more damage.
  • King Black Dragon has this done as well, except his dragon fire breath is more stronger, if the user is not fully protected.
  • Queen Black Dragon has not had this update effect her combat.
  • Glacors has been properly coded (hopefully I got everything) which will include the:
    – Ice Spike Attack
    – 3 Minions who appear at 40% hp
    – Each minion has their own unique identity to the Glacor.
  • Cape stand has been fixed for players who has Max Cape, and has not yet obtained the Completionist Cape. Players will now get a menu in which they can reclaim their Max Cape if they lose it.

Still working on players so of course theres not 100+ online. I’m working on this upon players requests. Currently finishing up the next beta for Slayer, as my main projects, along with a few other projects.

I currently only work by myself for trust reasons so updates aren’t rolling out as fast as everyone else. Though the environment is friendly and it’s a great place to chill and have some fun. I hope to see some new players and like to see everyones suggestions for updates.

Thanks for reading ^^

Read full topic

item.title: [718] LonelySouls || Customs || New Content || Highscores || Check it out!
item.dc:creator: @_JESUS2 LonelySouls
item.description:
@_JESUS2 wrote:

[center][/center]

So this idea I got from a friend of mine, I liked it so I decided to put it on here.

Player Owned Shops are:

Well…

Exactly what it says.

Shops that are Owned by the Players.

Each Player can access their own Shop by going through your Account Manager

[spoiler=Path:]
[center]
Quest Tab

Account Manager

[3] Player Owned Shops

[2] Manage My Shop
[/center][/spoiler]

Once you access your shop, click any item in your Inventory that could normally be tradeable, and it will add it to your shop.

BE WARNED: Make sure to have your shop LOCKED while you edit prices otherwise players can buy from you the minute you put it in.

If you choose to use this feature, it is your responsibility to make sure your store is secure when adding items, and changing prices. Once you have made the prices as you wish they to be, then you should UNLOCK your shop to players.

[spoiler=Right Click Menu:][/spoiler]

Small GIF showing how to edit to your own price.

To claim your payments, they are all transferred to a Vault which you can access in Account Manager > Player Owned Shops

Read full topic

item.title: [718] LonelySouls || Customs || New Content || Highscores || Check it out!
item.dc:creator: @_JESUS2 LonelySouls
item.description:
@_JESUS2 wrote:

[center][font=times new roman][size=28pt][COLOR=orange]Good Morning Lonely Soulers![/COLOR][/size][/font][/center]

[center]I am proud to annouce that:

[/center]

[center][size=14pt]Has Arrived![/size][/center]

Right now, this is all the works I’ve done on it so far, and I really hope I can have a lot of people help me test to see what I can improve and what is perfect! It will help a lot if I can get all the feedback I can from you guys. So if you find a bug, or find errors in my PvP system please, let me know.

This update also introduces Grave Stones, you can start by talking to the Pastor at home. He will open the interface for you to pick which Grave Stone you wish to have. After that, any location that is not PvP will allow you to have a gravestone upon death. You will have that certain amount of time to retrieve your items before other players have access.

[center][size=24pt]Thanks everyone and Enjoy![/size][/center]

Thanks again for everyone’s support and dedication, I’m glad you are enjoying yourselves and I hope this update will please a lot of players!

[center][/center]

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @_JESUS2 LonelySouls
item.description:
@_JESUS2 wrote:

[center]

To go to the event, enter the Christmas Cupboard at Home.

As Christmas approaches, so does evil, and oh boy did it come quick. Jack Frost kidnapped Santa and now Christmas is doomed! The Queen needs YOU to go find Santa and save Christmas!

To start the 2014 Christmas Event, speak to the Queen of Snow located in her Snow Tent, northern part of the event.


[/center]

[center]More Information Here
Forum: Lonely Souls[/center]

Hello Everyone,

Just some patch notes related to Christmas and some future updates. Patch Notes

Along with the patch notes I’ve got some projects going down this week which will hopefully include the ability for PvP and Effigies.

Some suggestions from players in which I’ll be working as as well Here

Thanks

Lonely Souls

Read full topic
